Is everyone ready?"/pause 1000/waitForOtherPlayers startContest/jump Lewis/pause 1000/speak Lewis "Let the egg hunt begin!$h"/advancedMove Maru false -2 0 0 6 -9 0 0 -2 -9 0 0 -1 2 0 0 -12 6 0 0 -7 3 0/advancedMove Abigail false 0 21 -20 0 0 3 7 0 0 -15 -9 0 9 0 0 18/advancedMove Jas false 0 12 8 0 0 10 3 0 0 4 14 0 0 -20 -6 0 0 3/advancedMove Sam false 4 0 0 -4 2 0 0 -4 12 0 0 -6 19 0 0 20 0 -20 0 20/advancedMove Vincent false 0 3 24 0 0 21 9 0 0 4 -20 0 20 0 -20 0/playSound whistle/playMusic tickTock/playerControl eggHunt
content.Abigail_spouse: Go away, we're adversaries until the egg hunt is over!$h
content.Leah_spouse: I never had many friends in town, so these events are always kind of boring for me. I enjoy the buffet, though.
content.Maru_spouse: I'm just catching up with Penny. Have you had your fill of eggs?
content.Penny_spouse: Maru's trying to convince me to eat a deviled egg. I'm just not sure I can stomach it...
content.Haley_spouse: I was going to eat some eggs, but then I remembered I'm on a spring diet.
content.Sebastian_spouse: I'll be rooting for you in the egg hunt.$h
content.Sam_spouse: The gang's just the same as always. Are you having a good time?
content.Alex_spouse: Ungh... I think I ate a dozen too many hard boiled eggs...$s
content.Harvey_spouse: How is everyone doing? I'm just taking a break for a little while. I'm looking forward to seeing you in the egg hunt!
content.Elliott_spouse: I enjoy seeing you so relaxed, my dear.$h
content.Abigail: Searching for eggs is like going on a treasure hunt.$h
content.Robin: Spring is a busy time of year... so it's nice to have a day off to catch up with friends.
content.Demetrius: Egg... what a strange thing to eat.
content.Maru: I always look forward to these gatherings... it makes the valley feel like a real community.
content.Sebastian: We used to do a rotten egg toss...#$b#Mayor Lewis put an end to that pretty quick.
content.Linus: No one really talks to me... I just come for the deviled eggs.
content.Pierre: Hey! How'd you get back here?$u#$b#Don't touch anything.
content.Caroline: Abby's always loved the egg hunt, ever since she was a tiny girl.
content.Alex: I try to eat at least three eggs every day.#$e#I need that protein for my legs.
content.George: What's everyone so happy about? Hmmph...#$b#Eggs... why eggs?
content.Evelyn: This festival has been a tradition for as long as I can remember.#$b#Tradition connects us with both the past and the future... it's comforting.
content.Penny: The children have been looking forward to this festival for weeks.
content.Pam: Hehe... I put something nice into the punch.$h#$e#Shhh... that's just between you and me, kid.
content.Emily: I've been up since dawn coloring eggs... it's always my favorite part of the season.$h
content.Haley: This festival is alright... but what I'm really looking foward to is the Flower Dance.
content.Jodi: Vincent loves this festival... it's a joy to see him so happy.
content.Kent: I'm not a big fan of eggs, to tell you the truth.
content.Marlon: Even with my bad leg, I never miss a town festival.
content.Leah: Mmmm... This fruit punch is unusually good.$h
content.Shane: Our hens have been working overtime to prepare for this festival.#$b#They deserve the best tonight... bowls full of sweet yellow corn!$h
content.Marnie: Welcome to the Egg Festival... complements of my wonderful brood of hens.
content.Elliott: Taking breaks from work can make you more productive in the long run.
content.Gus: I hope everyone's enjoying the food... I've been cooking for days to get everything ready.#$b#Fried eggs, boiled eggs, poached eggs, deviled eggs, scrambled eggs, chocolate eggs... you name it!$h
content.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... it's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
content.Wizard: Hmm... And what about raw lizard egg sprinkled with blackened marrow?
content.Harvey: Eggs definitely have a place in the well-balanced diet.#$e#Oops... I should take off my Doctor's hat for the time being.$11
content.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
content.Jas: I hope I can find some eggs before Vincent takes them all...$s
content.Vincent: When does the egg hunt start?! I'm so excited!!$h
content.Willy: Sometimes I'll hide an egg too well and no one finds it...#$b#Well, until summer rolls around. Then the hot air starts to bring out the rotten smell... Hehe. $h
content.???: Ah, the sewers are flowing quickly today. It'll get nice and humid in here... just how I like it.
